channel.title: CelestialX
channel.description:
[size=18pt]Welcome to CelestialX's project thread![/size] [size=14pt] Server Information:[/size] Project Insanity Based. 317 Loading Higher ItemDB/Mapdata etc.
Paid Web server located @ Miami, 24/7 Of course, Unlimited Data/Data transfer. Space for 50 SQL Databases.
Game server located @ Netherlands, Current Low Basic 2,8Ghz Duo core, 8GB RAM, Windows Server 2012 Data center. Remote Control Access.
Next Upgrade. 3,6GhZ I7 8 Core, 16GB Ram, Fiber Net Preferred Linux Based.
Website / Forum are basically build. Website currently under construction. [url=http://celestialx.com]Home - Celestial X[/url] [url=http://forum.celestialx.com/]Community Forum CelestialX[/url] Web client - [url=http://www.celestialx.com/index.php/2014-04-03-07-19-20/webclient]Webclient - Desirlena Gaming[/url]
When everything goes as planned: The first couple of months the money gained on Advertisement / Donations will be used for "See Below" Java application Certificate SSL Certificate IPboard Certificate
After all this has been achieved money gained will go spread under the team for the work done. And this will be a serious job.
[size=14pt]Pictures![/size]
King Black Dragon! [IMG]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/kbd_zpsa1e3c49f.png[/img]
Bork! [IMG]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/Bork_zps27e37a31.png[/img]
Fishing! [IMG]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/fishing_zpsbd6c7aba.png[/img]
PvP! [IMG]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/kingofthehill_zpsf982d6e2.png[/img]
Working Clan Chat Setup! [IMG]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/cc_zpsa20ea620.png[/img]
Raid Boss Teleports! [IMG]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/tele1_zps5032a733.png[/img]
Ogre Training Location! [IMG]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/Untitled_zps0dc074dc.png[/img]
Barrows! [IMG]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/barrows_zps73834c15.png[/img]
Working Clan Chat! [IMG]http://i93.photobucket.com/albums/l55/Masterlop/cc2_zps44e6ba5d.png[/img]
